---
title: Rice Pilaf
description: Rice pilaf
categories: [Snack]
cooktime: 45 minutes
date: 2023-01-01
---

* 1 cup rice
* 1/8 cup spaghetti noodle broken into 1/4 inch pieces
* 1.5 tbsp butter
* 1 tsp chicken bouillon
* 2 cups water

Heat the butter in a sauce pan then add rice and noodle. Add boillon to the water and mix to combine then add to sauce pan. Cook on high for 1 minute then cover and simmer for 40 minutes.
